items.title: XXI Stock Rises Pre-Market Even As Company Clears Path For Share Resale
items.description: Strategy CFO Andrew Kang and EVP Wei-Ming Shao sold thousands of shares in May 2025, and were soon hit with a Class Action lawsuit.

items.title: $6.3M Bitcoin Transfer Sparks Trump Reserve Sale Claims, But On-Chain Data Shows Only Custody Move
items.description: The U.S. Marshals Service transferred $6.3 million worth of Bitcoin linked to the Samourai Wallet case into Coinbase Prime custody.

items.title: Why Is OneStream Stock Soaring Over 15% Premarket Today?
items.description: The financial software firm is reportedly nearing a buyout deal.

items.title: Jensen Huang’s Nvidia CES Key Note Disappoints Gene Munster, But He Says ‘Don’t Read Into It’ — Here’s Why
items.description: The semiconductor giant announced a slew of AI chips, including its next-gen Vera Rubin AI system for data centers.

items.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Futures Edge Lower Despite CES-Driven AI Optimism: Why NVDA, TSLA, AMD, AEVA, OS Are On Traders' Radar Today
items.description: Markets seem to be balancing CES-driven AI optimism with caution ahead of upcoming jobs data this week.
